content.question: Which of the following actions by Napoleon aided the cause of German unification?

choices.label: The elimination of many small states and the political reorganization of territory
The incorporation of Schleswig-Holstein into Prussia
The expulsion of the Turks occupying the European territory where German was spoken
The reversal of the long-standing policy of French support for the Holy Roman Empire
The requirement that all people in conquered lands speak a common language, French

content.answer: The elimination of many small states and the political reorganization of territory

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
